2.0.0.en: Rewritten app for go-e EV Chargers support Homey SDK3 and go-e APIs V1 for older devices and V2 for 3rd and 4th generation latest devices. Supports now multiple configured devices and introduces some new features on√∂y available in API V2, such as Force Single Phase mode.

2.1.0.en: BREAK: unused energy_total removed, meter_power is now total energy and meter_power.session has last session
